New Records: Freddie Freeman hit the first walk-off grand slam in World Series history
Key Match Events: The game went into the 10th inning, making it a classic opener
Freddie Freeman's grand slam ended the game
Pre-Game Insights: This was the third straight World Series opener to go into extra innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game featured notable players like Shohei Ohtani and Anthony Volpe
